content: Improved collaboration with designers to ensure effective communication and alignment of design goals, resulting in highly polished interfaces and seamless user interactions.
Proactively generated innovative project ideas and refined development processes to maximize productivity and streamline workflow, resulting in improved project outcomes and reduced time-to-market.

Actively assisted senior developers in managing complex design projects by providing valuable insights, contributing to architectural decisions, and ensuring successful project execution within defined timelines.
Utilized advanced troubleshooting and debugging techniques to identify and resolve performance bottlenecks, resulting in enhanced application speed, responsiveness, and overall user satisfaction.

Showcased an unwavering commitment to delivering exceptional UI and UX by paying meticulous attention to detail during implementation, complemented by thorough testing to ensure a robust and seamless user experience.
Collaborated with the development team to understand project requirements and implemented features under their guidance.
Actively participated in code reviews, providing constructive feedback and making necessary enhancements to ensure code quality.
Developed a movie application using React, where users can search and explore movie details.
Integrated The Movie Database (TMDb) API to fetch movie data, ensuring real-time information updates.
Implemented responsive design techniques to ensure optimal user experience across different devices and screen sizes.
Designed and developed a dashboard application inspired by JIRA, utilizing Bootstrap and Plain CSS for the user interface.
Developed a CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) application using React Redux.
Designed and implemented a user interface to manage and manipulate data, providing seamless data operations.
Implemented data validation, error handling, and optimized performance for a smooth user experience.
Contributed as a frontend developer during my internship at the French Institute of Pondicherry.
Took on the responsibility of developing an archive information system and atlas.
Leveraged my skills to create an intuitive and user-friendly frontend interface.
Collaborated with the research team to understand their requirements and incorporate them into the system.
Ensured the seamless integration of archival data and provided efficient access to relevant information.
Employed best practices in frontend development to deliver a high-quality and visually appealing system.
